means: 检查，核对( check的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: She has had many credits and name-checks in American Vogue.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国版《时尚》多次对她进行赞扬或是提到她的名字。

sentence.Network_en: He is being constantly monitored with regular checks on his blood pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被实时监测，定时量血压。

sentence.Network_en: The service covers contraceptive advice and health checks, and is available free.
sentence.Network_cn: 服务项目包括避孕建议和健康检查，并且免费提供。

六考勤(Checking attendance)1．点名Right ! I\'m going to call the row.OK!

entry.def: If you check something such as a piece of information or a document, you make sure that it is correct or satisfactory.

example.ex: Check the accuracy of everything in your CV...
example.tran: 请核对简历中的每个细节，务必准确无误。

example.ex: It's worth checking each item for obvious flaws...
example.tran: 有必要逐件检查一下是否有明显的瑕疵。

entry.tran: 检查，查看(以确保一切正常)
entry.def: If you check on someone or something, you make sure they are in a safe or satisfactory condition.

example.ex: Stephen checked on her several times during the night...
example.tran: 斯蒂芬夜里起来看了她好几遍。

example.ex: He decided to check on things at the warehouse.
example.tran: 他决定去仓库查看一下。

entry.tran: 在…上打钩（以确定其正确、已选定或已处理）
entry.def: If you check something that is written on a piece of paper, you put a mark, like a V with the right side extended, next to it to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.

example.ex: Frequently, men who check answer (b) have not actually had the experience of being repeatedly rejected by women.
example.tran: 多数情况下，选(b)的男人没有真的尝过三番五次被女人拒绝的滋味。

entry.def: To check something, usually something bad, means to stop it from spreading or continuing.

example.ex: Sex education is also expected to help check the spread of AIDS.
example.tran: 人们还希望性教育有助于控制艾滋病的蔓延。

example.ex: ...free press that will check corruption by ensuring total transparency in government.
example.tran: 通过确保政府行政完全透明来抑制腐败的新闻自由

entry.def: If you check yourself or if something checks you, you suddenly stop what you are doing or saying.

example.ex: He was about to lose his temper but checked himself in time...
example.tran: 他刚要发火，不过又及时克制住了。

example.ex: I held up one finger to check him.
example.tran: 我竖起一根手指头制止了他。

entry.def: When you check your luggage at an airport, you give it to an official so that it can be taken on to your plane.

example.ex: We arrived at the airport, checked our baggage and wandered around the gift shops...
example.tran: 我们到了机场，托运了行李，到礼品店里逛了逛。

example.ex: You can check your baggage right through to its final destination.
example.tran: 你可以把行李直接托运到终点。

entry.def: The check in a restaurant is a piece of paper on which the price of your meal is written and which you are given before you pay.
In a game of chess, you say check when you are attacking your opponent's king.

entry.tran: (通常为两种颜色的)方格图案，格子图案
entry.def: A pattern of squares, usually of two colours, can be referred to as checks or a check .

example.tran: 款式包括条纹的和格子的。
红白相间的格子连衣裙

entry.tran: 受到控制的；被控制住的
entry.def: If something or someone is held in check or is kept in check, they are controlled and prevented from becoming too great or powerful.

example.ex: Life on Earth will become unsustainable unless population growth is held in check...
example.tran: 人口增长要是不加控制的话，地球上的生命将无法持续发展。

example.ex: He's found someone with a bit of fight to keep him in check.
example.tran: 他发现有个厉害的主儿能镇住他了。

entry.def: A check is the same as a cheque .

example.en: My father handed in his checks three years ago.
example.zh: 我的父亲三年前去世了。

auth_sentence.content: Random phone checks confirmed the validity of the consent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Random phone checks confirmed the validity of the consent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Random phone checks confirmed the validity of the consent.

auth_sentence.content: That's what checks and balances are all about.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's what checks and balances are all about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's what checks and balances are all about.

auth_sentence.content: We can improve the background checks in two ways.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can improve the background checks in two ways.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can improve the background checks in two ways.

Sentence.sentence: As well as the background checks carried out by platform owners, online reviews and ratings are usually posted by both parties to each transaction, which makes it easy to spot bad drivers, bathrobe-thieves and surfboard-wreckers
An employee asked, "Would the new system create long lines to get into the building like the lines in the airport security checks?
He usually checks his brakes before a trip
Whether the security checks were really necessary.
